name: Kpop Stress Race
description:
Hey Kpop lover! I'm glad to bring back Kpop Stress Race - one of the best Kpop game ever!

Sometime stress, sometime fun, most of time both - it's the main idea of the game.
Each idols with give you a game - which is very simple, but hard to master; and easy to get angry :D

More challenges will come with updates! Hope you find more fun than stress!
